ratings.comment: Phenomenal and very instinctive teacher. He is very adaptable and open to students' ideas; if you ask to move back a test, he will be receptive to it. Very kind and caring person, enthusiastic and excited about teaching. He really appreciates it when people participate, so be prepared to speak in class.

He's very nice and cares about the success of individual students, making sure everyone is participating and understands, however he's very vague when assigning projects and doesn't tell us about exams until the week before (if that).

Redouane is a memorable teacher. He pays attention to his students and makes an effort to mold the class criteria to something that will interest everyone. He has realistic expectations and rewards effort and genuine interest above perfection.
He's a great person who is nice, funny, and cares about his students. However, he is disorganized and very vague on assignments
Great teacher! He genuinely cares about his students and wants to see them succeed. Also, such a funny guy.
He makes it an interesting class, with a lot of group discussion and he truly cares about his students. Although he does have his favorites and grades subjectively.

Redouane was great! Very funny guy and he's always willing to help you if you don't get something, but sometimes it's a little hard to understand him if he tries to explain it in English (he's from Morocco and has a very heavy accent), but overall he's really helpful. Very fair grader. Not a difficult class and I'd definitely recommend him.
I love Redouane. He loves what he does and his class is fairly easy. Showing up, participating, and putting in a little effort should get you an A, no problem.
